q1.content: Right now, across a typical week, how do your days vary?
q1.requirement: Understand the variation in the interviewee's daily activities throughout a typical week.

q2.content: At what kind of job or jobs do you work, and when do you work?
q2.requirement: If the participant says they do not work, your objective is accomplished. If not, learn about the nature of the interviewee's employment.
q2.condition: The interviewer does not know what kind of job or jobs the interviewee works, and when the interviewee works

q3.content: Do you have other routines or responsibilities that you did not already share?
q3.requirement: Explore other regular activities or responsibilities the interviewee has.

q4.content: Tell me about any recent changes to your daily routine.
q4.requirement: Discover any recent adjustments in the interviewee's daily life. Encourage the interviewee to elaborate on changes mentioned in their daily routine.
